hu.vadasz.peter.knockmessenger.Activities

Class BaseActivityWithKnockDecoder

  • java.lang.Object
    • AppCompatActivity
      • hu.vadasz.peter.knockmessenger.Activities.BaseActivity
        • hu.vadasz.peter.knockmessenger.Activities.BaseActivityWithKnockDecoder
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    MessageSendingActivity

    public abstract class BaseActivityWithKnockDecoder
extends BaseActivity
    Classes implementing this abstract class can receive detected signals from KnockDecoder module. This class is responsible for permission requests result.
